extendedInfo.description: Join the brutally whacking fun in this zombie theme remake of the classic game. The infestation of the really, really annoying zombies has reached alarming heights. Help the world get rid of the zombies by repeatedly bashing them on the head. But be careful don't knock down the mercy angels.How to play:Tap on the zombies to whack down them. You need to clear the preset amount of zombies within the time limit. The initial time limit is 30 seconds. You will get additional time when you hit a series of zombies but you will lose some time if you hit an angel. Furthermore you can increase/decrease the preset amount of zombies if you dare.There are two modes for players. The hard mode consists of 4*4 grids while the easy mode only consists of 3*3 grids. You can also submit your score to online Leaderboard. Let's bash together now!
